Articles.Content:
I have created a vtol in the past, but ever since 0.25, it has been rendered useless (incompatible). I've been looking at some of Cupcakes Atmospheric Dropships, so I got inspired. This is looks a lot like one of cupcake's ships, but it isn't. It has an emergency system which is bound to the abort action group. It has 3 engines: 2 rocket engines and 1 jet engine. It has the rocket engines to make maneuvers simpler because you don't have as much spooling lag. 2/3 throttle should make it barely lift off, and a little under that should make it hover. I made little video about it so that you can see it in action:

Download
